item.description:
The next and final meeting of the HAC Bible Discussion Group will be 2:00PM until 5:00PM on Saturday, October 24 at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden. We will see a video from 2PM until 3PM and will discuss the video and readings and the book in general from 3PM until 5PM. Please bring a snack to share and, as always, feel free to bring a friend.

Reading for October 24:

Please read the remaining sections from our series reference How to Read the Bible: A Guide to Scripture, Then and Now, by James L. Kugel.

  • Chapter 32. Ezekiel, pages 599-616
  • Chapter 33. Twelve Minor Prophets, pages 617-634
  • Chapter 34, Job and Postexilic Wisdom, pages 635-643
  • Chapter 35, Daniel the Interpreter, pages 644-661
  • Chapter 36, After Such Knowledge, pages 662-689


For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll probably be upstairs in the library.
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Bible Reading Group
